name: Paint by Pixel 2
description:
Unleash your inner artist with Paint by Pixel 2! With 95 levels of fun and beautiful art, you'll have hours of creative enjoyment ahead of you. Choose from a wide range of beautiful art to create your masterpiece.

Paint by Pixel 2 is perfect for anyone who loves to be creative and wants to try their hand at pixel art. Even if you're not an experienced artist, you'll find the game easy to learn and fun to play.




Choose between brush or fill mode, recolor your drawings to personalize them, and use zoom and the magnifying glass to focus on details. The game also includes an autofill feature and hints to make things easier!

Features

  • Choose from 95 beautiful works of art!
  • Pick and play any level!
  • Customizable colors!
  • Beautiful soundtrack!
  • Zoom and magnify for easy play!

With simple controls and intuitive gameplay, you'll be creating beautiful pixel paintings in no time.
